references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of Bayesian Optimization, the foundation upon which the current research builds.

references.paper_title: Efficient global optimization of expensive black-box functions
references.reason: This seminal work introduced the fundamental concepts of efficient global optimization using expensive black-box functions, which is central to the current research.

references.paper_title: Taking the human out of the loop: A review of Bayesian optimization
references.reason: This review paper provides a broad overview of the field, summarizing various applications and techniques in Bayesian Optimization, which is relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: Active Exploration via Experiment Design in Markov Chains
references.reason: This paper directly addresses active exploration in Markov chains, providing a key methodological framework for handling transition constraints in Bayesian Optimization, a central theme of the current research.

This paper offers theoretical guarantees for efficient exploration strategies in reinforcement learning, which are crucial for addressing the challenges of planning ahead in transition-constrained Bayesian Optimization.
